subject: RHET
name: Contemporary Arts
fullname: Contemporary Arts (a.k.a. Arts in the Twin Cities and Beyond)
info: Visual and performing arts in the Twin Cites: art museums and galleries, theaters, and concert halls. One weekly lecture with a lab for contemporary arts events. Optional practicum--a trip to New York City.

subject: RHET
name: Functional Photography
info: Basic photographic communication. Emphasizes techniques of producing 35mm color transparencies for use in presentations/publications. Students provide their own camera/film.

subject: RHET
name: Digital Photography
info: Introduction to digital photography. Selecting/using a digital camera. Going digital with a film camera. Editing digital images. Printing/publishing digital images.

subject: RHET
name: Rural & Urban Images In Film
fullname: Rural and Urban Images in Film
info: Country and city life as described in motion pictures, American and international. The "country mouse/city mouse" conflict from ancient literature to the present. Examine the rhetoric of film as an art form with its own criteria of excellence.

subject: RHET
name: STC Teaching Seminar
fullname: Scientific and Technical Communication Course Development: Teaching Seminar
info: Mentor with faculty, usually concurrently with student's first teaching assignment. Students shares observations, solves teaching problems in seminar setting. Issues facing new teachers, developing a philosophy of teaching. Focuses on evaluating work in classroom.

subject: RHET
name: Theo&Prac:Intern'l Bus Comm
fullname: Theory and Practice in International Business Communication
info: Theories and practice in international and intercultural scientific, technical, and business communication. Examine cultural differences by studying cultural metaphors and research studies, by interviewing people from other cultures including international business managers, and through case studies.
